ModMetaData.name: The walking dead
ModMetaData.author: Skyarkhangel
ModMetaData.description: This is a individual mod, which works on the basis of Zombie apocalypse mod by Justin C. Adds a living dead to the game. The walking dead can reanimate over time, if the brain had not damaged. Living dead using new behavior, tactics, they can break down the doors and even a walls! Walking dead will react only if the victim is found. New resurrect animation can help you identify not completely killed living dead.
